firstDay.print: You: Hi, what can I do for you today?
???: I’d like a basic room please.
These rooms definitely aren’t cheap y’know.
???: Y'know, I prefer the past to the present and the present to the future.
Dylan: Dylan. I’ll be staying for two days.

longerStay.print: You: Hello! Welcome back to the Three Eagles Hotel!
Dylan: Hey, could I extend my booking? This cute little hotel is actually pretty cozy.
You: Sure, how many days would you like to add on?
Dylan: Just until the end of the week. I have a friend in town that I’m gonna visit!
You: Sounds good! You’re all set. Is there anything else you need?
Dylan: A quick question on the pricing - any chance a longer stay gives me a discount or anything?

longerStay_yes.print: You: We do indeed! It’s a 10% total discount if you stay more than 3 nights.
Dylan: Oh, okay! Your eyes are free like the ocean...
You: Uh... Did you want any shampoo?

longerStay_no.print: No, sorry! We do have different free items from day to day, though.
Dylan: Oh, okay! Your eyes are free like the ocean...
You: Uh... Did you want any shampoo?

roomSwap.print: Dylan: Hey, do you mind if I change rooms?
Dylan: There are some strange noises coming from the room beside me...
You: What noises are coming from the room?
Dylan: Just a bunch of things I can only describe as a young female voice constantly yelling out “tu tu ru.”
Dylan: I honestly think she’s being possessed, please help a guy out.
You: That’s weird... Alright, just move to this room right here, 101.
Dylan: Thanks! And are there any cafes nearby? Or things to do in this town?
You: Joe’s cafe is just down the street.
And honestly, the most exciting thing in this town is watching the tumbleweeds roll across the road.
Dylan: He who rides the tiger is afraid to dismount.
